description: This file defines a utility class 'StringUtils' with static methods for string manipulation such as case-insensitive searches, extracting method names from strings, and converting strings to lowercase. It is intended for use within a C++ project for string-related operations.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for string manipulation such as case-insensitive search, extracting method names, and converting strings to lowercase.

methods.name: string toLower(const string & input)
methods.description: Converts the input string to lowercase.

methods.name: bool rfindInsensitive(const string & reference,const string & key)
methods.description: Checks if the 'key' string is found within 'reference' string in a case-insensitive manner, using rfind.

methods.name: bool checkStartsWithCaseInsensitive(const string & method,const string & key)
methods.description: Checks if 'method' starts with 'key' in a case-insensitive manner.

methods.name: string extractMethodName(const string & method)
methods.description: Extracts the substring after the last '.' in 'method' and converts it to lowercase. Logs an error if the format is invalid.

ctags.name: checkStartsWithCaseInsensitive
ctags.pattern: /^    static bool checkStartsWithCaseInsensitive(const string& method, const string& key) {$/

ctags.name: rfindInsensitive
ctags.pattern: /^    static bool rfindInsensitive(const string& reference, const string& key) {$/
